    • getArrivalTimeSchedule

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.time.LocalTime> getArrivalTimeSchedule()
      Obtain a hashmap which contains all the arrival's localTime for each intersection the user should pass. The key is the id for the intersection and the value is the localTime.
      Returns:
      arrivalTimeSchedule a hashmap which contains all the arrival's localTime for each intersection the user should pass.

    • getDepartureTimeSchedule

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.time.LocalTime> getDepartureTimeSchedule()
      Obtain a hashmap which contains all the departure's localTime for each intersection the user should pass. The key is the id for the intersection and the value is the localTime.
      Returns:
      departureTimeSchedule a hashmap which contains all the departure's localTime for each intersection the user should pass.
